description:
A client of Insight Globals is seeking a Lead Data Scientist to join their growing EIM team. This resource will lead and coordinate highly complex and enterprise critical data science projects, requiring extensive expertise and knowledge in the data science field. The Lead Data Scientist will be responsible for leading problem analysis, customer interaction, solution design, front end and back-end integration, maintenance, and support of data science and analytics solutions. Day-to-day responsibilities will include leading multiple, concurrent projects and/or guiding projects, mentoring team members, and implementing innovation technical visions for the business unit. User experience mindset, including the production of visualizations and infographics to distill complex information Expert working with Hadoop, Hive, Apache Spark, etc. Expert working with machine learning, neural networks, deep learning BS in engineering from ABET accredited institution or masters degree in data science or related field, or three years of relevant experience in lieu of a degree 7
years of relevant experience in data science or related technical activities Extensive experience using scripting and querying languages, such as Python, R, SQL, and others Extensive experience in serving as a technical lead in support of large, complex projects Experience with data visualizations tools:
Tableau, MicroStrategy, or PowerBI (or equivalent) Extensive knowledge of statistics, statistical modeling, and statistical process control
Salary Range:
$100K -- $150K
Minimum Qualification
Data Science & Machine LearningEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
